text: I can help <@U02AQ0UCZDJ>. let me share you a link!
here is link(I guess this will help): <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/source-code#endpoint?spec=GET-/cms/v3/source-code/{environment}/metadata/{path}>
I have checked the link. Unfortunately, this is not what I need.
I just want to sync users of website to HubSpot. My website is in Angular frontend + Symfony backend.

Hey <@UATE4ATHP>
Thanks for sharing the link. But this API for contacts would be one time save to HubSpot. I want sync of users.
You would have to write the code to sync your users. Using the contact API

and you have to call HubSpot api when any user register in your application! (this is for new users)
What about DB users?
â€¢ Don't worry by using foreach loop you can write a code and register each user in db to HubSpot.
I hope it will help!
